extendedInfo.description: The APPRISOR Viewer is specifically designed for organizations to keep their audiences apprised of critical reference content such as clinical practice guidelines, medical meeting planners, and product information. This simple-to-use viewer automatically categorizes content by author organization and provides quick and intuitive navigation through bookmarks and full-text search.Select and download available documents directly to your device through the viewer and keep important information close at hand.All content is free and provided by the respective professional organizations.APPRISOR: Handheld Informatics for Healthcare Professionals
